meanings.definition: The quality or state of being permissive.
meanings.sent1: Her permissivenesses towards her children's choices made them feel valued and respected.
meanings.sent2: The permissivenesses of the new school policy allowed students more freedom in their projects.
meanings.sent3: The permissivenesses of the traffic rules led to chaos on the roads.
meanings.sent4: In a world of strict regulations, his permissivenesses stood out like a colorful painting in a gray room.
meanings.sent5: The permissivenesses of the forest allowed all creatures to roam freely and peacefully.

meanings.definition: The act of allowing or granting permission.
meanings.sent1: His permissivenesses in granting extra break time made the employees happy.
meanings.sent2: The permissivenesses of the event organizer made it easy for attendees to bring their own food.
meanings.sent3: The permissivenesses of the teacher in extending the deadline surprised the students.
meanings.sent4: Her permissivenesses in letting her cat explore the garden showed her caring nature.
meanings.sent5: The permissivenesses of the museum staff in allowing photography made the visitors excited.
